thread.title: Mrs Sara Wilson
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs Sara Wilson

author: Mrs Sara Wilson
title: Mrs Sara Wilson
text: I ordered a large roman blind for my bedroom and was delighted that blinds to go had a fabric which I liked better than any elsewhere, and for half the price! It arrived within a few days, and now hung I am very pleased with it. The quality and look are fab. It looks really expensive even though it wasn't! Thank you
